author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Skari, Josh, and Luka control 3 eccentric wizards and their respective war bands of thugs, thieves, and weirdos as they explore the frozen, and very dangerous city of Frostgrave.  Skari controls a Slaanesh wizard.  Josh controls a Wizard with a submachine gun.  Luka controls Sharkey (Saruman).  This narrative campaign uses the rules by Osprey Publishing for Frostgrave 2nd Edition.

Members to watch Episode 2, go here
Youtube Members - https://youtu.be/W4ecqxeqdwE
Vault Members - https://www.miniwargaming.com/content/the-mausoleum-of-the-necromancer-frostgrave-campaign-ep-2

In collaboration with Skari from Skaredcast - http://patreon.com/skaredcast

Terrain for the battle report from:
Game Mat - http://www.gamemat.eu
Games Workshop - https://www.warhammer.com/en-CA/home
Green Leaf Terrain - http://www.facebook.com/greenleaf.terrain
Tabletop World - http://www.tabletop-world.com
